custom_fields.rs:content_text:
In my little corner of the FHE world, things have been steadily heating
up. For those who don't know, my main work project right now is HEIR
(Homomorphic Encryption Intermediate Representation), a compiler
toolchain for fully homomorphic encryption (FHE). For an extended
introduction see this talk from October 2023. The primary focus of HEIR
is to compile to FHE hardware accelerators. And boy there are a lot of
them. There are GPU and FPGA accelerators, as well as special purpose
ASICs and even optical accelerators (discrete Fourier transforms at the
speed of light).
